50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] used to say in his supplication: 'Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minash-shiqaqi wan-nifaqi, wa suw'il-akhlaq (O Allah, I seek refuge with You from opposing the truth, hypocrisy and bad manners)

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَاذَةِ مِنَ الشِّقَاقِ وَالنِّفَاقِ وَسُوءِ الأَخْلاَقِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from Opposing the Truth, Hypocrisy and Bad Manners
